meanings.definition: Given to making jokes; characterized by joking.
meanings.sent1: She is the jokier one in our group, always making us laugh.
meanings.sent2: He became even jokier after attending the comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The jokier atmosphere at the party lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent4: Her jokier nature shone brightly during the talent show.
meanings.sent5: The jokier tone of the conversation lightened the mood instantly.

meanings.sent1: The new comedian's jokes were even jokier than the previous ones.
meanings.sent2: As the night went on, his humor became jokier and more entertaining.
meanings.sent3: The jokier comments from the audience added to the fun of the show.
meanings.sent4: Her jokier approach to storytelling captivated the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The jokier punchline of the joke left everyone in stitches.
